title: Technical Interviews, are they necessary?
post: Maybe we need to rethink how we conduct interviews for developers. Do we need the technical interview or should there be a significant change in the interview process?

title: Learning to code in 2023
post: There are definitely more resources when learning to code than there were 10 years ago. But is it too much?

title: Is ChatGPT good or bad for developers?
post: OpenAI's ChatGPT is a great tool for developers to use to help them write code. But is it a good thing?
